AGS.MU.summary: Allgemeine Gold- und Silberscheideanstalt AG engages in the manufacture and sale of semi-finished precious metal products in Germany. The company provides precious metals, including gold, silver, platinum, and palladium. It offers its products for use in jewelry, watchmaking, coin, electrical engineering, automobile manufacturing, medical technology, and chemical industries. The company was formerly known as Aktiengesellschaft von Pforzheimer Schmuck-und Uhrenherstellern. The company was founded in 1891 and AG is headquartered in Pforzheim, Germany. Allgemeine Gold- und Silberscheideanstalt AG is a subsidiary of Umicore S.A.
